bug.description: At the moment, the method does not provide satisfactory output in Google Colab, as reported in this video: <denchmark-link:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pLxgt20kKWU>https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pLxgt20kKWU</denchmark-link> . It seems this is a problem with Colab's support for ipywidgets: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/googlecolab/colabtools/issues/60>googlecolab/colabtools#60</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: The package now displays a warning when colab with widgets is used until Colab fully supports ipywidgets.
